[[size 120%]] **UIU Author Page: 2020-02** "GreenGolem"[[/size]]

**Summary:** On September 2nd of 2020, a researcher named "Hudson Bassett" joined the Foundation under the alias "GreenGolem". Activity was too minimal for the UIU to detect during this period. However, during July of 2021, activity spiked. Suspect began doing shitty research projects, posting a large number of them. They even started going over to other GOIs in order to "Get a feel for their environment", and created documentation for them as well.

[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Suspect Description/Capabilities]]

**Name:** Hudson Bassett (Alias: GreenGolem)

**Irregularity Cross-reference:** Shitposter

**Capabilities:** Suspect is capable of making a large amount of very terrible posts in a short span. These usually range from unfunny jokes (i.e. puns), all the way to creating false conspiracies about large-scale threats.

**Purpose/Motive:** Unknown.

**Modus Operandi:** Suspect gets online very night and forces himself to write thousands of words within an hour. After this is done, he goes to the IRC channels, and attempts to get a critter for 3 hours before giving up and coldposting the article.

**Behavior:** Suspect is said to be incredibly dumb, but somehow still was able to get into the Foundation. Investigations ongoing.
[[/tab]]

[[tab Suspect Statement on Critiques]]
**Foreword:** Suspect has been reported handing out flyers whenever he meets a new person. Each of these flyers detail the suspect's policy on "Critiques". It is unaware of whether such policy is present within the Foundation ranks.

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Ay, so you want me to critique your work? See the list below.

||~ ##green|Likes## ||~ ##red|Dislikes## ||
|| Comedy || Overly Gorey Articles ||
|| Mystery || Drafts longer than they should be ||
|| Antimemetics || Murder monsters ||
|| Pictures and Color || Articles whose narrative doesn't match how good it looks ||

Do you still want me to critique your work? Great! I'm always happy to critique a work. Please PM me on Wikidot or DM me on discord (Golem#1668).
[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Suspect's Will]]
**Foreword:** The suspect's will has been located. It is listed below.

[[div class="blockquote"]]
If you think I'm dead, then think again! I will never die! If I am missing, I am simply on a hiatus. If I am on a hiatus for a minimum of 1 year (Not having made a single post or edit), then [[*user tstaffor]] will be able to do whatever he wishes with my articles until I return (In which case, it will go promptly back to me). If Tstaffor is unable to complete this duty (or doesn't wish to), then that responsibility goes to [[*user Fish^12]]. If Fish^12 is also unable to take up such a role (or doesn't wish to), then [[*user Zyn]] gets the responsibility. As for co-authored articles, the responsibility of keeping those articles are to be left to the other co-author(s) until I return.
[[/div]]
